# songs

**Instance Property**

An array of MusicKit song objects that represent the song.

## Declaration

```swift
var songs: [Song] { get }
```

## Discussion

For more information about the MusicKit song object, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/MusicKit/Song].

## Reading Apple Music properties

- **appleMusicURL**: A link to the Apple Music page that contains the full information for the song.
- **appleMusicID**: The Apple Music ID for the song.
